statements: DELETE FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM humidity_data WHERE greenhouse_id = 10 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = '34567890-abcd-1234-efgh-098765432100' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM greenhouse WHERE temperature < 20 AND last_inspection < '2021-12-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM greenhouse_sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND humidity_value < 20.0;
DELETE FROM plant_growth WHERE growth_time > '2022-06-01 12:00:00' AND greenhouse_id = 1;
DELETE FROM sensor_logs WHERE humidity > 80 OR temperature < 25;
DELETE FROM greenhouses WHERE location = 'New York' AND max_capacity > 50;
